mdRecord.dcterms:title: pH paper
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Micro Essential Laboratory [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in cardboard box, label information: Test Paper and color chart, hydrogen ion, and dispenser; Range is between 2-10: 1-11; Class A-Roll; Cont N62851-1296; Manufactured by Micro Essential Laboratory, Brooklyn 10, New York; Controlled by R.P Cargille laboratories, Inc. New York 6, New York; manufactured 1957-08.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
